item.title: Parliament Winter Session Day 21 Live Updates: Rajya Sabha resume; on last day of Winter Session, Lok Sabha adjourned ‘sine die’ amid Centre-Oppn uproar - The Indian Express
item.description:
Parliament Winter Session Day 21 Live Updates: On last day of Winter Session, both Houses adjourned ‘sine die’ amid Centre-Oppn uproar

Date & Source: December 21, 2024 | Indian Express

On the final day of the Winter Session of Parliament, both Houses were adjourned sine die shortly after reconvening amidst a faceoff between the Centre and Opposition MPs, related to protests over comments made about B R Ambedkar.

  • The Lok Sabha adopted a resolution referring bills on simultaneous elections to a joint parliamentary committee.
  • Protests in Parliament led to a scuffle involving Opposition and BJP MPs.
  • Two BJP MPs were reportedly injured during the confrontations.
“In a decisive move aimed at maintaining decorum, Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla issued instructions that no political party or groups of MPs will be allowed to hold any protest at the gates of Parliament House.”

This session's conclusion highlights ongoing tensions between political parties in India, particularly concerning the treatment of historical figures like Dr B R Ambedkar.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro colour changing design revealed ahead of India launch- All details - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro to become the world’s first colour-changing smartphone, here’s everything you need to know.

Publication Date: Dec 20, 2024Source: Hindustan Times

The Realme 14 Pro is set to launch in India soon, showcasing a unique color-changing design that has generated significant buzz in the smartphone industry.

  • The Realme 14 Pro features a innovative color-changing back panel.
  • It has received several IP ratings (P66, IP68, IP69) for durability against water and dust.
  • The smartphone is designed with a circular camera module and enhanced camera technology dubbed MagicGlow.
  • The color-changing effect activates below 16 degrees Celsius, created in collaboration with Valeur Designers.
  • The global launch is expected in January 2025, with other brands also launching new models around the same time.
“The Realme 14 Pro will become the world’s first color-changing smartphone.”

This innovative design positions Realme as a frontrunner in smartphone technology, potentially reshaping market competitiveness and consumer expectations.

item.title: Flat Earther YouTuber's Myth Busted After He Spends $37,000 On Trip To Antarctica | WATCH - NewsX
item.description:
Flat Earther YouTuber’s Myth Busted After He Spends $37,000 On Trip To Antarctica | WATCH

Publication Date: December 18, 2024 | Source: NewsX

Flat Earther YouTuber Jeran Campanella shattered his beliefs about the Earth's shape after a $37,000 trip to Antarctica where he witnessed the 24-hour sun phenomenon, prompting a significant shift in his long-held theory.

Key Points:

  • Jeran Campanella traveled nearly 14,000 miles to Antarctica to validate his Flat Earth beliefs.
  • He discovered the reality of the Midnight Sun, challenging his previous notions about the sun's movement.
  • Campanella admitted, "Sometimes you are wrong in life. I thought there was no 24-hour sun."
  • A local pastor organized “The Final Experiment” to provide evidence against the Flat Earth theory.
  • Despite existing evidence, some still cling to the Flat Earth theory.
“What does it mean? You’ll have to figure it out. To me, it means that the AE map no longer works, but that doesn’t mean that I’m right.” — Jeran Campanella

This trip not only transformed Campanella's perspective but also sparked discussions about the Flat Earth theory's validity.

item.title: The Moon might be older than scientists previously thought — a new study shines light on its history - Down To Earth Magazine
item.description:
The Moon might be older than scientists previously thought — a new study shines light on its history

Published on: 20 Dec 2024, 6:23 am

The study discusses how new perspectives on the Moon's history may change scientists' understanding of its formation. The research explores tidal heating effects and challenges existing estimations concerning the Moon's age.

  • The Moon's formation is linked to a Mars-sized object colliding with Earth.
  • Initial Moon rocks suggest the Moon is about 4.35 billion years old, but this may not reflect its actual age.
  • The research proposes that tidal heating might reset radiometric clocks in lunar rocks.
  • Further analysis and samples from ongoing lunar missions may provide clarity on the Moon's formation timeline.
“If the Moon warmed up enough, its clocks would lose their memory and would start recording time only once the Moon cooled down again.”

The implications of these findings could reshape our understanding of planetary formation and the early solar system's dynamics.

item.title: Race against time: US govt may shut down on Friday; what does it mean? - Hindustan Times
item.description:
US Government Faces Shutdown as Debt Ceiling Debate Intensifies

Date: Today | Source: Hindustan Times

The US government faces a shutdown as lawmakers are unable to agree on a temporary funding plan amidst a significant debt ceiling crisis.

  • The Republican-led House rejected a temporary funding plan backed by President-elect Donald Trump.
  • The bill failed with a vote of 235 to 174, reflecting division among Republicans.
  • Trump is demanding a provision to raise the debt limit be included in any funding legislation.
  • If the debt ceiling is not raised, it could lead to default and severe economic disruption.
  • Speaker of the House Mike Johnson faces pressure as he navigates this critical issue.
  • Key figures like Representative Chip Roy and Elon Musk have influenced the debate, voicing strong criticisms of proposed plans.
"To congratulate yourself because it’s shorter in pages but increases the debt by $5 trillion is asinine." - Representative Chip Roy

As the deadline approaches, the nation awaits a resolution to avert a government shutdown and its possible repercussions.

item.title: Oneplus 13 launch on January 7: 5 reasons to buy the new-gen smartphone - Hindustan Times
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Launching on January 7: 5 Reasons to Buy the New-Gen Smartphone

Date: December 20, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The OnePlus 13 is set to debut in India on January 7, 2025. The smartphone promises exciting upgrades, including a new design and enhanced specifications, which have created a buzz among tech enthusiasts eager for its global launch.

5 Reasons to Buy OnePlus 13

  • Improved viewing experience: Upgraded BOE X2 Quad-HD+ LTPO AMOLED display with ultrasonic fingerprint sensor and peak brightness of 4500nits.
  • Performance beast: Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, 40% faster than the previous generation.
  • Flagship camera: Triple camera setup fine-tuned by Hasselblad featuring 50MP main, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses.
  • Longer battery life: Upgraded 6000mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging capabilities.
  • New design: Available in three color options with unique finishes, including a vegan leather back panel.
“The OnePlus 13 will feature a triple camera setup consisting of a 50MP main camera, a 50MP ultrawide camera, and a 50MP periscope telephoto lens offering 3x optical zoom.”

As OnePlus gears up for the release, excitement is building for what this new smartphone will deliver in terms of innovation and performance.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan leave daughter Aaradhya Bachchan's school event together amid divorce rumours. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan Seen Together Amid Divorce Rumours at Daughter's School Event

Date: Dec 20, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan attended their daughter Aaradhya's annual school event together, dispelling ongoing divorce rumours.

  • The couple was seen together at Dhirubhai Ambani School alongside Amitabh Bachchan.
  • They exhibited affectionate gestures, including holding hands and capturing moments from Aaradhya's performance.
  • Speculation about their separation arose in July 2024, after the couple was seen arriving separately at family events.
  • The school event was attended by other Bollywood stars including Shah Rukh Khan and Kareena Kapoor.
“The couple was accompanied by actor Amitabh Bachchan, who came to support his granddaughter Aaradhya.”

Despite speculation regarding their marriage, Aishwarya and Abhishek's appearance together signals ongoing family unity.

item.title: Nasa on alert as airplane-sized 120-foot asteroid to approach Earth on Christmas eve - The Times of India
item.description:
NASA on Alert as 120-Foot Asteroid Approaches Earth on Christmas Eve

Publication Date: December 2023 | Source: Times of India

NASA is closely monitoring the approach of asteroid (2024 XN1), which is approximately 120 feet wide and is set to pass near Earth on December 24.

  • The asteroid will pass within about 7,217,247 kilometers (4,480,000 miles) of Earth.
  • It will be traveling at a speed of 6.59 kilometers per second (approximately 23,724 kilometers per hour).
  • Other smaller asteroids will also approach Earth in the days leading up to Christmas.
  • No current asteroids tracked pose a threat to Earth.
“Objects approaching within 4.6 million miles and larger than 150 meters are classified as potentially hazardous, though all currently tracked objects pose no threat to our planet.”

This upcoming asteroid event serves as a reminder of NASA's continuous monitoring of near-Earth objects and their potential risks.

item.title: Hillary Clinton slams Elon Musk's role in govt shutdown drama: 'Republican party taking orders from the w - The Times of India
item.description:
Hillary Clinton slams Elon Musk's role in govt shutdown drama: 'Republican party taking orders from the world's richest man'

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Times of India

Hillary Clinton has publicly criticized Elon Musk for his perceived influence over the Republican party amid ongoing government shutdown negotiations, suggesting that the party is succumbing to the directives of the world's richest individuals.

  • Clinton highlights Musk's power and its implications for governance.
  • She suggests that the GOP's alignment with wealthy individuals like Musk undermines democratic processes.
  • The comments come in the context of ongoing budget negotiations and potential government shutdown.
"The Republican party is taking orders from the world's richest man."

Clinton's statement raises concerns about the intersection of wealth and political power, prompting discussions about accountability and influence in American politics.

item.title: International Gemmological Institute IPO share listing today: Stock debuts at 22% premium over issue price - CNBCTV18
item.description:
International Gemmological Institute IPO share listing today: Stock debuts at 22% premium over issue price

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: Various News Outlets

The shares of the International Gemmological Institute (India) debuted on the exchanges with a premium of 22%.

The IPO was well-received, showcasing strong interest from investors and analysts alike.

  • Shares listed at ₹510 on NSE, compared to an upper price band of ₹417.
  • On BSE, shares listed at ₹504.85, indicating a 21% premium.
  • The IPO received a subscription of 35 times, reflecting robust demand.
  • Funds will be used to acquire IGI Belgium and IGI Netherlands, consolidating global operations.
  • IGI India holds a 50% market share in the Indian certification market.
“As the jewellery market expands, the demand for certifications will likely grow, driving IGI’s business further,” said analyst Palak Devadiga.

The IPO's performance indicates strong investor confidence in IGI, positioning it well for future growth within the global jewellery market.

item.title: "Not Acceptable": RSS Chief Frowns Upon New Temple-Mosque Disputes - NDTV
item.description:
'Not Acceptable': RSS Chief Frowns Upon New Temple-Mosque Disputes

Publication Date: November 26, 2024

Source: NDTV

RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat has voiced concerns about the revival of temple-mosque disputes in India. He remarked that some individuals are exploiting these issues after the construction of the Ayodhya Ram temple in a bid to position themselves as leaders within the Hindu community.

  • Bhagwat emphasizes the importance of an inclusive society to uphold harmony amongst communities.
  • He highlighted that various religious festivals, such as Christmas, are celebrated along with Hindu traditions.
  • Expressed disappointment over ongoing disputes and the need for resolution to maintain unity.
  • Brought attention to historical perspectives on communal tensions and the past, particularly regarding the influence of colonial rule.
“Every day a new matter (dispute) is being raked up. How can this be allowed? This cannot continue. India needs to show that we can live together.”

In conclusion, Mr. Bhagwat calls for unity and stresses that the traditional customs of worship must coexist peacefully within the framework of Indian democracy.

item.title: Abhishek Bachchan holds Aishwarya Rai’s dupatta at Aaradhya’s school annual day event, Amitabh Bachchan cheers for granddaughter. Watch - The Indian Express
item.description:
Abhishek Bachchan holds Aishwarya Rai’s dupatta at Aaradhya’s school annual day event, Amitabh Bachchan cheers for granddaughter. Watch

Date: December 19, 2024, Source: Indian Express

The Bachchan family made a joint appearance at Aaradhya’s school annual day function amidst rumors of trouble in their relationship, showcasing unity and support.

  • The event took place at the Dhirubhai Ambani School in Mumbai.
  • Aaradhya captivated the audience with her impressive performance in a Christmas play.
  • Bollywood celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan were also in attendance.
  • Abhishek and Aishwarya demonstrated their strong bond and support for family.
“To be very honest, when a family is complete, it's beautiful. I wish every family always remain intact.”

The Bachchan family's attendance sent a message of unity against speculation about their personal lives, much to the relief of their fans.

item.description:
Periods Getting Shorter in Your 30s? Concerns and Insights

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Recent observations suggest that many women in their 30s are experiencing shorter menstrual cycles, raising questions about potential health implications.

  • Shorter menstrual cycles observed in numerous women
  • Could indicate underlying health issues
  • Importance of consulting healthcare providers
"Changes in menstrual cycles can signal health changes that should not be ignored."

It is essential for women to stay informed about their reproductive health and seek medical advice if they notice significant changes in their cycles.

item.title: BJP leader C.T. Ravi likely to be produced before Special Court in Bengaluru - The Hindu
item.description:
BJP Leader C.T. Ravi to Appear Before Special Court in Bengaluru

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: The Hindu

BJP MLC C.T. Ravi, arrested for making derogatory remarks about Minister Lakshmi Hebbalkar, is expected to appear in court today, following protests against his treatment by the police.

  • C.T. Ravi was arrested on December 19, 2024, after allegedly insulting Minister Laxmi Hebbalkar.
  • Following his arrest, there were protests by Ravi against the police actions.
  • Ravi accused the police of conspiracy and assault, while authorities refuted his claims.
  • He faces charges of sexual assault and outraging a woman's modesty.
  • There is public unrest surrounding his arrest, with BJP supporters gathering to support him.
“The police commissioner and other officers have taken the law in their own hands,” said BJP MLA Basanagouda Patil Yatnal.

The case surrounding C.T. Ravi's remarks has caused significant political tension and public demonstrations in Karnataka, indicating ongoing issues within local governance and law enforcement.

item.title: "I'll Be Walking Out With You...": R Ashwin's Reply To Virat Kohli's Retirement Post Is Pure Gold - NDTV Sports
item.description:
R Ashwin's Heartfelt Reply to Virat Kohli's Retirement Tribute

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: NDTV

The cricket community is abuzz with tributes as Ravichandran Ashwin announced his retirement from international cricket. Virat Kohli shared an emotional message reflecting on their shared journey, to which Ashwin responded with warmth.

  • Ashwin retired after the Brisbane Test against Australia.
  • Kohli expressed his emotions and memories of their partnership over 14 years.
  • Ashwin's response highlighted their strong bond and camaraderie.
“Thanks buddy! Like I told you, I will be walking out with you to bat at the MCG.” — R Ashwin

This signals the end of an era for Indian cricket with Ashwin's departure, leaving behind a legacy of excellence.

item.title: Decode Politics: From ‘alarm’ to ‘adoration’, how RSS, BJP evolved in their view of B R Ambedkar - The Indian Express
item.description:
Decode Politics: From ‘alarm’ to ‘adoration’, how RSS, BJP evolved in their view of B R Ambedkar

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

The ongoing political dynamics in India have spotlighted the BJP's shifting stance towards Dr. B R Ambedkar, especially amidst recent tensions in Parliament regarding remarks made by Union Home Minister Amit Shah.

  • The recent showdown in Parliament highlights the BJP's evolving stance on Ambedkar.
  • The BJP seeks to attract all Hindu castes, including Dalits, into its political fold.
  • The party’s engagement with Ambedkar is described as politically expedient, especially in competition with the weakened Congress.
  • Ambedkar's history as a critic of the caste system complicates his place within Hindu nationalist politics.
“The BJP has attempted to bring all Hindu castes, including Dalits, under the fold of Hindutva — constantly redefining its position on Ambedkar.”

This transformation in the BJP's approach to Ambedkar reflects broader changes in India's political landscape and the party’s strategy to unify diverse groups under its ideology.

item.title: Marco X Review: Here's What Audiences Are Saying About Unni Mukundan's Action Thriller - Filmibeat
item.description:
Marco X Review: Audience Reactions to Unni Mukundan's Latest Action Thriller

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: Filmibeat

Marco X, a much-anticipated Malayalam action thriller directed by Haneef Adeni, stars Unni Mukundan and was released for the Christmas weekend. The film is a spin-off of the 2019 movie Mikhael and aims to offer an intense cinematic experience.

  • The film features a powerful ensemble cast, including Jagadish, Siddique, Anson Paul, and Yukti Thareja.
  • Marco tells the story of Marco, the younger son of a notorious family involved in gold smuggling, who embarks on a journey of uncovering the truth after a shocking event.
  • The movie is also available in dubbed versions in Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, and Hindi, increasing its audience reach.
  • Music is composed by Ravi Basrur, with cinematography by Chandru Selvaraj and editing by Shameer Muhammed.
  • The film was produced by Shareef Muhammed under Cubes Entertainments.
Stay tuned for insightful reviews on X (formerly Twitter), as audiences share their thoughts on this action-packed thriller.

Marco promises to deliver not only thrilling action but a compelling narrative enhanced by its star-studded cast and skilled production team.

item.title: Pushpa 2: Allu Arjun's Film REMOVED From North Indian Theatres Despite Being A Box Office Hit? - News18
item.description:
Pushpa 2: Allu Arjun's Film Removed From North Indian Theatres Despite Being A Box Office Hit?

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: News18

Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2: The Rule has become one of the highest-grossing films in Hindi cinema, but it has faced controversy as it was removed from PVR INOX theatres in North India.

  • The film has grossed Rs 600 crore within two weeks of its release.
  • It faced removal from North Indian theatres due to a reported dispute between the filmmakers and PVR INOX.
  • Trade analyst Manobala Vijayabalan reported the removal and later shared that the issue was resolved.
  • The film has crossed Rs 1,500 crore globally.
  • Allu Arjun was recently arrested in connection with a tragic incident during a screening of the film.
BREAKING: Pushpa 2⃣ REMOVED✖️ from all PVR INOX chains in North India from Tomorrow.— Manobala Vijayabalan (@ManobalaV) December 19, 2024
BREAKING: Pushpa 2️⃣ PVR INOX agreement issue now resolved✅ Shows opening slowly one by one⏳

This conflict highlights the challenges faced by successful films in the competitive landscape of cinema halls, especially amidst public incidents.

item.title: Delhi's overall air quality remains ‘severe’, AQI over 450 in some areas - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Delhi's Air Quality Remains ‘Severe’, AQI Over 450 in Some Areas

Date & Source: Dec 20, 2024 08:05 AM IST, Hindustan Times

Delhi's air quality on Thursday plunged into the 'severe plus' category, with a 24-hour average AQI of 451 recorded at 4 pm, according to CPCB data.

  • The overall AQI at around 8 am on Friday in Delhi stood at 434 - what the CPCB classifies as the severe category. Of the 35 monitoring stations listed on the government's Sameer app, Rohini, RK Puram, Sirifort, Dwarka Sector 8, Wazirpur were among those that recorded an AQI of over 450.
  • As per the CPCB, an AQI between 0 and 50 is considered 'good,' 51-100 'satisfactory,' 101-200 'moderate,' 201-300 'poor,' 301-400 'very poor,' 401-450 'severe,' and above 450 'severe plus.'
  • On Thursday, the city saw dangerously high levels of PM2.5, the primary pollutant, with 32 of the 35 monitoring stations recording air quality in the severe plus category. Some areas recorded AQI readings as high as 470. The PM2.5 particles, measuring 2.5 micrometers or less in diameter, pose significant health risks as they can penetrate deep into the lungs when inhaled.
Delhi remains under Stage IV of the Graded Response Action Plan (GRAP), which includes the most stringent anti-pollution measures. The measures involve a complete ban on construction activities and the entry of non-essential polluting trucks into the city.

The Indian Meteorological Department (IMD) had issued a yellow alert for Friday, warning of very dense fog in some areas. The maximum temperature on Thursday was recorded at 23 degrees Celsius, slightly above the season's normal, while the minimum temperature was five degrees Celsius, three notches below normal, as per IMD.
